DOC.brief_summary: A prospective controlled trial to compare the efficacy and safety of 7-day albendazole, single dose ivermectin, and 2-single dose ivermectin in 72 patients with chronic strongyloidiasis will be conducted at Siriraj Hospital, Bangkok, Thailand.
DOC.brief_title: Ivermectin Versus Albendazole for Chronic Strongyloidiasis
DOC.criteria: Patients with positive strongyloides larva in the stool Pregnancy Lactating women Known allergy to any study drug
